Title: Relates to requiring inspections for Legionnaires' disease in certain locations
Summary: Requires annual inspections in certain locations by the department of health for the presence of Legionnaires' disease.
LawCode: Add Art 21 Title 9 §§2190 & 2191, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring inspections for Legionnaires' disease in certain locations
